questions.question: When finding what is wrong all acceptable choices except?

choices.answer: D= Deformities
O=Open wounds
T=Time
S= Swelling

questions.question: Your friend is bleeding severely. After putting on rubber gloves, what is your 1st step 4 care?

choices.answer: Press firmly against the wound with a sterile bandage
Let the wound bleeds until it stops on its own
Apply pressure at a pressure point
Elevate the wound

questions.question: A friend is a having a nosebleed. It is important to have the victim

choices.answer: lay down
pinch their nose and lean slightly forward
pinch nose and lean their head back
stick tissue paper in their nose

questions.question: How can you protect yourself from disease?

choices.answer: Use protective equip. such as disposable gloves.
Ask the victim if he/she has a any communicable diseases.

questions.question: All are correct  when identifying what is wrong except

choices.answer: S=Signs and Symptoms
M=Medications
E=Events leading up to the illness
A=Animals involved

questions.question: Bleeding- If bleeding does not stop, you should take this next step

choices.answer: Add more dressing onto the first one and press harder.
Give stitches immediately
Leave the cut alone and call 911

questions.question: Third degree burns are the most serious and require immediate medical attention

choices.answer: True
False

questions.question: If you burn yourself and blisters appear, how should you proceed?

choices.answer: Cool burn with large amounts of cool water
Apply ointment or grease to the burn
Cover burn with dry, sterile dressings
Blow on the burn until it cools

questions.question: When removing gloves I should follow all the steps below except

choices.answer: Pinch one glove on the outside near wrist
Hold the removed glove in the gloved hand
Gently pull the glove off, while keeping the inside out
Slide 2 fingers of your bare hand onto the dirty glove.

questions.question: When someone rolls their ankle they should practice all steps below except

choices.answer: R=Rest
C=Compressions
I=Ice
E=Exercise- Run 5 miles
